tools_description: A set of common tools useful in managing accounts.
tools_state_globals_subheader: Current global values for the EOS blockchain.
tools_state_chain_subheader: Configuration values for the EOS blockchain.
tools_keys_key_generation_subheader: Generate public/private key pair combos for usage throughout EOS.
tools_keys_key_generation_warning_conten: This key generator does NOT save these key pairs within the application. Please ensure you backup these keys in another location if you are planning on using them.
tools_wallet_state_subheader: An overview of the local wallet state. This information can be used to help debug the application.
tools_wallets_subheader: Add, remove, and swap between the various wallets loaded within the app.
tools_proxy_form_message_about_to_regist: You are about to register as a proxy voter. People will be able to proxy their votes through you.
tools_proxy_form_message_about_to_unregi: You are about to unregister as a proxy voter. People will no longer be able to proxy their votes through you.
tools_proxy_text_not_registered: People will be able to proxy their votes to you if you give them your account name.
tools_proxy_text_registered: You are registered. People can proxy their votes to you if you give them the following account name.
tools_wallet_state_subheader: An overview of the local wallet state. This information can be used to help debug the application.
